title: Death on the Job ? Danger and Profiteering
description: Documenting the undocumented: As many as 8 million undocumented people are estimated to be in the United States, Census officials say, about half of whom are living in four large states ? New York, Florida, Texas and California. Yet, these official estimates have proven to be often unreliable and subject to dramatic change. As a result, we don't know very much about the health and safety conditions for today's illegal immigrants in America's workplace.
